name: MovementDisease
description:
Movement is a fastpaced 2D puzzle game where movement kills you!

This game was made for the Mini Jam 97.

Controls

Arrow / AWSD keys = moving

T = going back one level

Y = skipping one level

Left mouse click = delete objects on the board

Credits

Game engine: Godot

Music, art and programming: Me, myself and I

Font: Impact font

Pixel Art editor: Aseprite

Sound: Bfxr

Notes

There is no endscreen, sorry \ :

If you find any bugs, please do let me know in the comments.
